msContents.summary: Account of the private expenditures of Kronion, the official of the record-office (grapheion) of Tebtynis for the first five months of the 6th year of the emperor Claudius (from Sept. 1, 45 A.D. to Jan. 17, 46 A.D.; compare his official disbursements for the same period in P.Mich. II, 123, Recto, col. I, and Verso, col. I-II)
